entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sync stream serialization not handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #66687
    7.0.0
  • `System.GC.Server` setting in `runtimeconfig.template.json` is ignored for ASP.NET Core 6.0 #66686
  • JsonSourceGenerationMode.Metadata emits references to internal members from another assembly #66679
  • optSetBlockWeights should not scale blocks that have PGO weights #66678
    7.0.0
  • Provide a COM source generator #66674
    Future
  • HttpConnectionPool.RequestQueue leaking items #66673
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate(Type) assert causing test failures #66672
  • failure in LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.ManualTypeMarshallingAnalyzerTests.UninstantiatedGenericNativeTypeOnGenericWithArityMatch_DoesNotReportDiagnostic #66668
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute for mark functions returning rent arrays from some pool #66667
  • JsonNode does not respect PropertyNamingPolicy #66661
  • Unable to send multiple certificates in request using .net core 3.1 within HttpClientHandler #66660
  • [NativeAOT] Calling GVM on a struct in generic code is crashing with AV #66659
  • GetSatelliteAssembly() not throwing FileNotFoundException as documented #66656
  • Ability to collect infromation about an assembly load context in profiling API #66653
  • LdapConnection.SendRequest cause a segfault on linux #66652
  • [JIT] CodeVersionManager::LockHolder lock(Profiler ReJIT?) #66649
    7.0.0
  • SmtpClient SendMail/SendMailAsync not encoding subject correctly with Office365 SMTP server #66648
  • AOT build failure - out of memory #66647
  • dotnet/optimization builds are broken #66646
  • System.IO.Pipelines inifinite wait PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(Int32, CancellationToken) #66645
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Char> and ByteMark #66665
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #66643
  • Perf measurement changed due to BDN update #66664
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #66663
  • Linux Sockets: Reduce overhead and simplify code in SocketAsyncContext #66639
  • Cannot use BenchmarkDotNet with NativeAOT #66637
  • Reference source for System.Security.Cryptography is generated inconsistently between platforms #66634
    7.0.0
  • NegotiateStreamPal.Unix.cs does not support default auth #66633
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test_Http2.Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #66632
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTime.test1 #66630
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse41\\ConvertToVector128_ro\\ConvertToVector128_ro.cmd #66629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/API/GCHandle/Alloc_neg2/Alloc_neg2.sh #66626
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/regex-redux/regex-redux-5/regex-redux-5.sh #66625
    7.0.0
  • ushort argument mysteriously mutated #66624
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implementations of marshallers using `CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute` #66623
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Content-validating AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #66622

Closed

  • TerraFx.Interop.Windows is not getting trimmed when compiled using NativeAOT #66593
  • Running .NET 5.0 on WindRiver 18 ARM throws SegV #55911
    Future
  • Use cmeq, cmge, cmgt (zero) when one of the operands is Vector64/128<T>.Zero #33972
    7.0.0
  • Fix setup-stress-dependencies #48015
    Future
  • Visual Studio debugger does not work for CoreLib checked builds #52768
    7.0.0
  • [Linux/arm64] System.Net.NameResolution.Tests randomly fail #11437
    Future
  • area-Extensions-DependencyInjection About creating custom service providers #66394
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimiter should implement IDisposable and IAsyncDisposable #62370
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryStreamExtensions #65610
  • ARM32 register conflict for large stack frames and tailcalls #66585
    7.0.0
  • SslStreamNetworkStreamTest failing intermitently on OSX #46837
    Future
  • HttpListenerContext.AcceptWebSocketAsync unsupported for IWindowsPrincipal in .NET Core 3.1 #63738
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing from `Debug.Assert` in `JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate` #66469
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timing out on CI #66023
  • [arm32/linux] Assert failure: dwSrcIndex > dwLastSrcIndex in ABI stress #13241
    7.0.0
  • Span: Move length check to ctor #66669
  • GC regions failure in System.Threading.Tests.dll #66601
    7.0.0
  • Need more tests for non-DualMode socket usage #16602
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/complus_config/name_config_with_pid/name_config_with_pid.sh #66276
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\reverse\\reverse\\reverse.cmd #66278
    7.0.0
  • about httpclient #66258
  • Some `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` tests are timing out #66059
    7.0.0
  • Make it safer and easier to build an X500DistinguishedName #44738
    7.0.0
  • IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties().GlobalProperties.GetActiveTcpConnections() causes memory leak #64735
  • NativeAOT InvalidCastException while compiling a generic mess #66573
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/BinTree/thdtreegrowingobj/thdtreegrowingobj.sh #66644
  • Remove workarounds for missing "parameterless struct" C# feature #63120
    7.0.0
  • Json Deserialization of "dynamic" does not work #66638
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests #66583
  • Build failure in CI: LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests #66556
  • Add class X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension.cs : X509Extension #66613
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh #59611
    7.0.0
  • GC region related failure on alpine #66631
  • Stop using Socket directly in HttpConnection #63710
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `Math.Percentile(double[] sequence, double percentile)` #66454
  • Change SocketsHttpHandler's default ConnectTimeout to a reasonable finite value #66297
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging aot on CI #66685
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Await pending client authentication task before disposing #66682
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update Roslyn Testing SDK #66681
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Merged wrapper support for test exclusion lists #66680
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Surface native sourcelink on CoreCLR native PDBs for easier dump debugging #66677
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reenable CA 4701 #66676
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove test coverage of FeatureSIMD=0 #66670
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always append the "dll" extension for native libraries loads on Windows #66666
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Implement missing SymUnmanaged* interfaces #66650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address a few TODOs on S.S.C.Cose. #66641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix ReplaceModuleMapping for 32bit binary on 64bit kernel #66640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix pal test #66636
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Remove 4267 suppression from mono #66552
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix check for IsTrimmable metadata #66658
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add withAssert flag in getTierName method #66662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update maui SDK to 6.0.3xx #66671
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix stepping issues with ReadyToRun and TieredCompilation #66491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix register conflict between freeing large stack frames and fast tailcalls on arm32 #66588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable SslStreamNetworkStreamTests on OSX #66393
    area-System.Net.Security
  • support WindowsPrincipal in HttpListenerWebSocketContext #65746
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Backport AVX context fix #66120 #66356
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix assert for ARM shuffle thunk #66642
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add vector measurements to the bench Sample #66655
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix for assert failure in distribute free regions #66657
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector conversion methods #66597
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector unary plus operator #66586
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Some small copy propagation changes #66582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector dot product #66589
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revert "[Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64" #66598
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove _socket field from HttpConnection #66416
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add vcsjones to more area tags in fabric bot #66628
    area-Meta
  • Tweak SuperPMI collections #66627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable reading PGO data when switching to optimized #66618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set SocketsHttpHandler's default connect timeout to 15s #66607
    area-System.Net.Http
  • A bunch of small regex tweaks #66572
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #66364
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Pack Stopwatch into a single long #66619
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Issue 62532 config binding #66267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] try this with icu updated #66528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Clean up redundant type checks after GDV #55124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable some ARM32 tests #66553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66612
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.ReadKey should print a char, not an integer #66609
    area-System.Console
  • Improve NamedPipeClientStream.Connect edge cases handling #65553
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Text.Json tests affected by DST #66559
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize and clean-up `System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator`. #65251
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for storing locals of type struct #1866

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Compat] Ensure strict mode finds override removals #24390

Closed

  • SDK 6.0.3 (6.0.201) is released, but https://aka.ms/dotnet/6.0/dotnet-sdk-linux-x64.tar.gz points to 6.0.103 #24317
  • B #24221
  • With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK, fail to run .NET 7 winforms/wpf project #24329
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22161.14] latest build breaks WinForms/WPF apps #24355
  • Installing workloads fails when using rollback files with workloads that only exist in a previous band #24368

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Add support for RazorLangVersion 7.0 #24383
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Add design for cross-version workloads #24070
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24367
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Switch away from expiring helix queues #24078
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open question for semi auto properties (static local functions or lambdas containing `field`) #5923

PullRequests

Created

  • Update required members sections #5924

Updated

  • Remove incorrect `override` keywords #5828
  • Updates to native-sized integers proposal #5920

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Prioritize background work for visible documents #60185
  • Please support highlighted fields and attributes #60180
  • VS displays the wrong field value #60179
  • Separate auto-formatting (on typing) from code style indentation logic #60178

Closed

  • "Convert to for" code fix produces invalid cast using "var" #50469
    Backlog
  • AccessViolationException in IVsPreviewChangesService.PreviewChanges #35701
    Backlog
  • Incorrect entries being shown after calling FindEntryPoints #59696
    17.3
  • Extract method of part of static local method creates non static method causing compile error #58013
    17.1
  • `async foreach` binds to `IAsyncDisposable.DisposeAsync()` rather than pattern based `DisposeAsync()` #59955
    Compiler.Next
  • Verify incremental parsing merged `EqualsGreaterThanToken` in `ParseLambdaExpression()` #60002
    Compiler.Next
  • [EnC] CustomAttribute rows in delta seem out of order #60125

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SyntacticClassifier and SemanticQuickInfo tests for checked user-defined operators. #60191
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add syntax normalizer tests for checked user-defined operators. #60190
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Inline Hints: More logic around handling named arguments #60184
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Adjust CheckedKeywordRecommender for checked user-defined operators. #60183
    Area-IDE, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fixed "Convert typeof to nameof" for types, nested in generic types #60182
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60177
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Added aditional test to "ForeachToFor" refactoring #60186
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Port encapsulate field tests to new harness #60162
    Area-IDE, Next
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60189
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60170
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59971
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [17.1 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60096
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, Next
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix symbol-finder crash in mixed C#/TypeScript projects #60173
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE
  • Add IsFabricatedToken assert #60005
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Add accessor to Razor test registration service #60121
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure declaring compilation can be located for source symbols created during compilation for EE evaluation. #60152
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating doc comments around existing comments #59763
    Area-IDE
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • use 4.2 version of the compiler to build #60065
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Validate with `-testUsedAssemblies` in a CI leg #60052
    Area-Compilers
  • Error when required members are not set #60101
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1662698 #60168
  • Fix unnecessary assigment false positive for out argument #60062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide name suggestions based on both collection and its element type #60129
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle more cases in F1 help service #60156
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI thread #60106
    Area-IDE
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTML Entities like &nbsp should be encoded into the SyntaxTree #40732
  • IIS Express module "AspNetCoreModuleV2" is removed after installing the NET Core 6.0 Hosting Bundle, breaking IIS Express's support for 6.0.3 #40730
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 in HTTP.sys #40728
  • Add some validation around the set of artifacts we produce #40725
  • Support accessing `RouteHandlerContext` in `IRouteHandlerFilter` #40724
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cant get the Site to work on Publish #40722
  • Blazor is NOT loosing SignalR connection. Browser is! #40721
  • .NET 6 regression causes UseEndpoints to throw an ArgumentNullException in MVC-only project w/ conditional compilation #40719
  • IHostBuilder.Build() times out after 5 seconds when running integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<T> on slow machines #40715
  • Add support for arugment list surrogates in minimal APIs #40712
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Azure webapps rewriting backslash to slash #40532
  • Deeplinking URL with Parameters in Blazor WebAssembly #40714
  • Blazor 6 : "Microsoft.TypeScript.MSBuild" and a collocated JavaScript file with a .razor file cause a build error on the Ubuntu #40640

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Get richnav.yml building again #40729
    area-infrastructure
  • Update recovery code generation #40723
    area-identity
  • Fix the missing arm64 sharedfx msi #40717
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Typo #40716
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Add architecture to targeting pack archives #40669
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove install-tar & mentions from repo #40720
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Support OpenAPI summaries and descriptions on minimal endpoints (#40088) #40718
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix typo correctly #40727
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix typo #40726
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Revert "Revert "Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json"" #40701
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Only build hosting bundle on x86 #40708
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix RadioButton check into registrar for renderer registration #5323
  • Entry ReturnType Prop #5321
  • RefreshView pull to refresh executes refresh command in Android but not iOS #5316
  • IWindow.DisplayDensityChanged not firing on Mac Catalyst / iOS #5315
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Shell Routing through attributes on page (using source generators) #5312
  • Allow Compatibility to be trimmed out of app #5310
  • Fix registrar invocations for Compatibility #5309
  • Make a better exception message when UseCompatibility needs to be called #5308
  • Maui Blazor Release Config App Throws Error #5301
  • RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue not triggered (windows app) #5298
  • Scoped Storage (Android) Not Allowing Files To Be Saved, But Saves To Internal Storage Work Fine #5295
  • Invoke Platform Code Works For One Platform Only, But Flagged As Wrong For The Two Others #5294

Closed

  • Empty view is shown in DatePicker instead of dates in Android platform. #3749
  • [Windows] Wrong default DatePicker and TimePicker TextColor #4165
  • Stepper - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5148
  • Move everything needed to run a basic .NET MAUI app out of the compatibility DLL #4890
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [WinUI, Shell] Implement TitleView #9808 #1628
  • Erroneous warning about SurveyPrompt being unexpected name #5241
    .NET 7
  • ResourceDictionary does not allow removing or modifying styles with classes, i.e. not hot reload friendly #4969
  • BlazorWebView inside iOS can't be reloaded #5247

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark renderers and related base classes as obsolete #5322
  • Update AOT Profile using the latest builds #5319
  • Updated HotReload, so it now listens to the MetadataUpdateHandler #5318
  • Remove SetupDefaults #5317
  • Enforce Width/Height for ContentView on Android #5314
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
  • Item Template cleanup #5311
    area/templates 📄
  • If needed, put WebView2 user data dir under LocalApplicationData. Fixes #4151 #5306
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [android] update Xamarin.Google.Guava.ListenableFuture #5305
    platform/android 🤖
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5300
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Add readme for FabricBot #5320
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't calculate routes on shell startup and don't setup bottom menu #5262
    area/shell 🐢
  • [controls] remove Linq usage and collection copying #5246
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Set the date after the DatePickerDialog is shown #5173
    control-datetimepicker
  • Eliminate the default color extraction logic to fix TimePicker Foreground color #5285
  • Make TitleView work in NavigationPage and Shell on Windows #5293
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Added embedding extensions #5218
  • [samples] Add format example to DatePicker and TimePicker #5286
  • Bump maui to the 300 band #5307
  • Use Factory methods in DependencyInjection #5290
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220315101900112 to loc #5299
  • Fix Blazor Hybrid page reloading for iOS #5291

Updated

  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Add IWindow.DisplayDensity #5185
    t/enhancement ☀️, p/1, area/desktop 🖥️, Cost:M, Status:InProgress, Future
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Notify ISwitch.IsOn property changes if IsToggled changed #5276
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating dynamically Entry TextColor #5282
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    do-not-merge
  • Trimming Clean up #5028
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345

  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396

  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Get Exception returns all DB context entries, which cause huge log file. and vulnerable to add modified, added data #27646
  • Save SQLite file to MyDocuments #27580
  • `ef migrations script --idempotent` generates broken script #27645
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.3 is not compatible with netstandard2.1 #27636
  • Provide API for returning Func<TEntity, bool> predicated based on keys #27623
  • QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking has different behavior in 'Debug' and 'Release' mode #27567
  • Why do I fail to duplicate AdventureWorks2019 with scaffolding followed by migration? #27644

Updated

  • Add support for managing Triggers with EF migration #10770
    Backlog
  • More streamlined workflow for early stage app development #3053
    7.0.0
  • navagation with keyed entity type mapped to sql query not supported? #27629
  • Loading derived entity #27633
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Proper way to seed test data in EF Core 6.0.2 #27599
  • Add EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions.ToLookupAsync #26867
    Backlog
  • IReadOnlyCollection<string> throws an exception with CosmosDB #27643
  • Add API to apply hierarchy mapping strategy for the whole model #27642
    Backlog
  • Clean up SaveChanges/batching tests #27640
    MQ
  • Reverse-engineer composite keys to PrimaryKeyAttribute when using data annotations #27637
    7.0.0
  • Delta Lake Provider #27632
  • After upgrading from EF 6.0.1 to EF 6.0.2: broken query generation when using aggregate #27621
  • Add-Migration fails with "An item with the same key has already been added" when renaming entity #27504
    7.0.0
  • Using PK with HasColumnType causes strange migrations for Owned Types #27619
    7.0.0
  • Bug: dotnet-ef --output-dir ignored for ApplicationDbContextModelSnapshot and placing in default folder #27631
  • Implement bulk deletion #27550
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 7.0 #26994
    Discussions
  • Migration for updated seed data does not set all enum values converted to string correctly #27575
    7.0.0
  • Allow temporal Period properties to be mapped to CLR properties (i.e. not shadow properties) #26463
    7.0.0
  • Relational: TPC inheritance mapping pattern #3170
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Scaffolding: Use "CodeTemplates" directory #27626
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.25.0 to 3.26.0 #27641
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add metadata support for TPC #27628

Updated

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
